title: Drawing, "Elevation of Salt Cellars"
medium: Black chalk on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Tripod in classical style with three legs standing upon base in center of which stands a pineapple.  Four figures, standing upon base, carry bowl. Only toe shown of fourth figure in rear. Drapery festoons connect clasped and raised hands of figures.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of Salt Cellars".
Black chalk on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3063.
